column1:
The  evidence  of 
the  witness  Sanjeewani who is the daughter of

the  deceased  Piyasena  that  the  basis  of  the  incident  is  a 
land  dispute  The

witness explained that the accused indicated his intention to  murder 
the two

persons if they are  not allowed  to  construct a  house in  the  lands. 
It appears
that the land in question had been held in common by all parties to  this case.
All  were  co owners of the  land and the accused had a  grievance  that he is not
